RequestInit.summary: The RequestInit dictionary of the Fetch API represents the set of options that can be used to configure a fetch request.

remarks.para: You can pass a RequestInit object into the constructor, or directly into the fetch() function call.

You can also construct a Request with a RequestInit, and pass the Request to a fetch() call along with another RequestInit. If you do this, and the same option is set in both places, then the value passed directly into fetch() is used.
